text: Ware ga onōno no min ni taishite, kare-ra kara hitori no shōnin o erande dasu hi, ware wa anata (muhanma do) o korera (makka no min) ni taisuru shōnin to suru. Sorede ware wa, subete no jibutsu o tokiakasu keiten o anata ni kudashi, shinja e no michibiki to jihi, soshite kippō to shita nodearu
